text: A violation of this subchapter is a violation of Chapter 39 of Title 28, for which a fine of not more than $10,000 may be adjudged.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 16-191 validated a previously made technical correction.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-164, see notes following § 48-831.01.

For Law 16-191, see notes following § 48-831.10.

chapter.text: Affordability of Prescription Drugs -- AccessRx Program.

subchapter.text: Transparent Business Practices Among Pharmacy Benefit Managers.
